channel.title: Windows xp recovery console
channel.description:
I need a really quick reply--within the next hour. I have a windows xp pro 64 bit install cd. My question is can I use that cd to use the recovery console and repair my friends system. I'm thinking I'm going to have to download the 32 bit version of xp pro. Also does the edition of xp matter with repairing windows xp of a corrupt system file?
A quick response would be very appriciated b/c I plan to be heading to her place within this hour. If I can't fix it tonight I'm going to let her use one of my computers over the weekend so I can download the iso.
Edit: problem solved the cd won't even boot. It says the arcitecture isn't compatible
Thank you

item.title: Windows xp recovery console
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
